subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. coach Paul Westphal was hired as the Dallas Mavericks’ executive vice president for basketball operations. Westphal, who was a Dallas assistant last season, will assist General Manager Donnie Nelson and work in scouting.
snippet: The former N.B.A. coach Paul Westphal was hired as the Dallas Mavericks’ executive vice president for basketball operations. Westphal, who was a Dallas assistant last season, will assist General Manager Donnie Nelson and work in scouting.
